content: CP 681 Tub box kit Firestop cast-in accessory to use in bathtubs drains ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- - - ### FEATURES:Features 2 device accepts a pass-through 1-1/2 pipe (with a sealing bushing) or a P-trap (direct connection to the coupling) 3 device accepts a pass-though 2 and can be adapter for smaller pass-though pipes Accessories available for extended heights and elongated box-outs Creates a 2-1/2 deep recess in the slab Applications Creates a 2-1/2 deep recess in the slab Can be used with bath tubs and jacuzzi drains For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Height: 8 in LEED VOC: 1.4 g/l Application temperature range: 23 - 122 °F Technical Data | LEED VOC | 1.4 g/l | Application temperature range | 23 - 122 °F ### ITEMS- 295455 - Tub Box, Classic (Standard) - Package Size 1 pc - 295456 - Tub Box, 3 Inch (Standard) - Package Size 1 pc
